title: Null Hypothesis
text: $$H_0$$: The absent days occur with equal frequencies, that is, they fit a uniform distribution.

title: Alternative Hypothesis
text: $$H_a$$: The absent days occur with unequal frequencies, that is, they do not fit a uniform distribution.

title: Sampling
text: We can sample from the population to ask on which day of the week they had the highest number of student. absences.
